verses.name: Romans 2:22
verses.text: Thou that sayest a man should not commit adultery, dost thou commit adultery? thou that abhorrest idols, dost thou commit sacrilege?

verses.name: Romans 2:23
verses.text: Thou that makest thy boast of the law, through breaking the law dishonourest thou God?

verses.name: Romans 2:24
verses.text: For the name of God is blasphemed among the Gentiles through you, as it is written.

verses.name: Romans 2:25
verses.text: For circumcision verily profiteth, if thou keep the law: but if thou be a breaker of the law, thy circumcision is made uncircumcision.

verses.name: Romans 2:26
verses.text: Therefore if the uncircumcision keep the righteousness of the law, shall not his uncircumcision be counted for circumcision?
